infos.speaker: president
infos.text: Greetings. We need you to keep going to meetings and interviews today. Don't be suspicious and everything will go well.
We are still working on our plan. However, humans are too many. We need to send them away so we can take Earth.
We are going to build a spaceship to send humans in space. You must convince them to go.
We noticed that humans will trust anyone that wears a white uniform. Tell them that someone in white uniform is working on the project. Humans like names. Try to find a name that sounds very clever.

infos.speaker: president
infos.text: Also, it seems that they judge intelligence by something they call a Ph.D. The more they have, the better. That's it for today. Good Luck. *Clic*
